name: Laser Tennis (Stepan Kirichenko)
description:
A recreation of "Laser Tennis" minigame from "It Takes Two" by Hazelight Studios.

Supports 2-4 player local multiplayer.

How to Play

1. Step on glowing buttons to send lasers to your opponents.

2. When you get hit by a laser, you take damage.

3. The last player that has HP left wins the round.

4. Do a groundslam on the big central button to send mutliple lasers at once.

5. Use double jump and dash for better mobility.

6. When Manual Targeting is enabled, press "Targeting" button and then choose a direction with movement keys to change target.
